summary: Antoine is too depressed to go on playing in his rock band. After wandering in the streets, he decides to seek an occupation. Unskilled as he is, he is lucky to be hired as the caretaker of... See full summary »
cast: Catherine Deneuve|Gustave Kervern|Féodor Atkine|Pio Marmaï|Michèle Moretti|Nicolas Bouchaud|Oleg Kupchik|Garance Clavel|Carole Franck|Olivier Charasson|Bruno Netter|Cécile Descamps|Fred Epaud|Claude Sésé|Fanny Pierre|Lévanah Solomon|Cléo Perrel|Miguel Eduardo Cueva|Ange Ruzé|Bernard Bourdeau|Lionel Emery|Adeline Moreau
title: En un patio de París
